entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dotnet tool] Add ability to check if a tool is installed #23549
  • [breaking] dotnet build/publish does not produce an exe/apphost for portable apps by default #23545

PullRequests

Updated

  • Better caching for RazorSourceGenerator when SuppressRazorSourceGener… #23419
    Area-AspNetCore, DO NOT MERGE, 6.0.3xx
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Backport Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ (#23318) #23400
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch, 6.0.3xx
  • `dotnet watch` test fix search console history #23521
    Area-Infrastructure
